product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Bare Burrito - Single Serving
long_description: MaryJanesFarm Organic Bare Burrito has a spicy blend of rice, beans, corn and cheese that is great with chips or eaten straight out of the pouch. Made with all-natural, USDA Organic ingredients. Can be prepared in its own pouch; just add boiling water, stir and let stand before serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: MaryJanesFarm Organic Bare Burrito has a spicy blend of rice, beans, corn and cheese that is great with chips or eaten straight out of the pouch.
